It is NOT possible to cheat in counter-strike: global offensive. How can I tell? Well, first off, this game is protected by Valve Anti Cheat, the best anti cheat to ever exist. This server is currently VAC protected, meaning that cheating will result in a permanent ban. And the new Secure Launch fully prevents ANY cheat from being injected into the game, so basically, Valve patched ALL the cheats.
